name: InfiniJump II - Return of the red square
name_original: InfiniJump II - Return of the red square
description:
This is InfiniJump II -- The sequel of InfiniJump (released feb'2016)

Price: [FREE]

It includes a bunch of new function, and it works a lot and a lot better now! Find it out by your own and play this wonderful game! A little Minigame, everyone can and should enjoy! What do you want more? This game brings the old and original jump'n'run games and the old and original plattformer games together -- on a completely new level! Enjoy!

Infini Jump II [PREMIUM PARTY] -- Price: $0.50

If you like to support us and itch.io you should buy this game. We share the money by 50% with itch.io (it was our own decission to do it) and we will use the rest to buy us some icecream. Please Notice: This Project was a hobby and we do not aim to get rich by selling this joke version and earning 25ct for it.

The Premium Party Version includes:

  • New Music
  • Awesome Partylight!

Enjoy :)
